pages.text: If Seasons is enabled, Pigs take 6 season months to mature.

Pigs require $(li)Water $(li)Food $(li)Straw(optional) $(br2)If pigs are missing water and food, they will eventually die.$(br2)Feed: $(li)Wheat $(li)Barley $(li)Corn $(li)Soybean $(li)Canola $(li)Potato $(li)Sugarbeets $(br2)Drops Manure (x3) $(br)Manure drop is doubled (x6) if pigs are given straw.
Pigs drop Manure (x3) every minecraft day. $(br2) If given straw, Manure output is doubled (x6). $(br2)Manure is very useful for crops. Potentially gives an increase in yield of 300%.
